help.message:
IceBreaker helps you spark meaningful conversations and create unforgettable moments with anyone: partners, colleagues, friends, family, or even strangers!
Explore thought-provoking questions across different categories and languages.

Commands:

/start - Start or restart the bot.

/help - Display this help message.

/suggest - Suggest a question to add to the game.

/language - Change the active language (supports 🇷🇺 Russian, 🇺🇸 English, 🇫🇷 French, 🇮🇹 Italian).

How to Play?

- Authenticate and select your profile (create multiple profiles for different groups).
- Pick categories you enjoy.
- Start drawing random cards with unique, thought-provoking questions to break the ice.
- Like your favorite questions‚Äîthey‚Äôll appear again in future rounds.

Why would you choose IceBreaker Bot?

- Explore diverse categories and draw random questions effortlessly.
- Fresh questions every time‚Äîno repeats unless you want them!
- Build personalized decks by liking the best questions.
- Switch languages in real-time for multilingual conversations.
- Suggest your own questions to make the experience truly yours.

Ready to create deeper connections and memorable conversations? Type /start to begin!

Do you like this bot? You can buy me a coffee and get access to a secret feature üòä
